title: ISMCornerReliefData.TangentToBend
description: Gets and sets whether to make the corner relief tangent to the inside bend edges.
returns: True to make the corner relief tangent to the inside bend edges, false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if:
ICornerReliefFeatureData::CornerType
is set to
swCornerReliefBendType_e
.swCornerReliefBendType_TwoBend
- And -
ISMCornerReliefData::ReliefType
is set to
swCornerReliefType_e
.:
swCornerCircularRelief
swCornerRectangularRelief
